name: Adventure bot
description:
• It's a pixelated Action and Adventure platform game.
  • This game has adventures levels, unexpected objects, and even more fun during game play. A robot that could attack with his head and firing bullets through his hand.
  • Levels are getting harder and harder. A messy world that poor robot living . Attacked by little monsters and unknown obstacles.
  • If you like hard and challenging levels you might be like this game....
  • CONTROLLERS   :
